channel.title: wxWidgets News
channel.description: wxWidgets: the open source, cross-platform native UI framework with 12 years of evolution behind it

item.title: Persony announces VShow
item.description: VShow is a cost-effective Web conferencing product that uses standard Web servers to host online meetings.

item.title: German Carrera revised wxPlot, based on PLPlot
item.description: wxPlot supports a variety of plotting styles suitable for scientific applications.

item.title: BitWise IM Version 1.0.4 now available
item.description: BitWIse IM is an encrypted cross-platform instant messenger featuring text messaging, whiteboards, file sharing, voice chat, encryption and more.

item.title: wxWidgets now in Tiger!
item.description: wxWidgets 2.5.3 Unicode (as well as wxPython and wxPerl 2.5.3 Unicode) are being bundled as part of the Mac OS X Tiger operating system.

item.title: Lit Window Productions releases wxVisualSetup 2.6
item.description: wxVisualSetup integrates the wxWidgets library into Microsoft's Visual Studio .NET IDE

item.title: wxWidgets 2.6.0 released
item.description: wxWidgets 2.6.0 is the first official, stable release for a long time but we think the wait has been worth it.

item.title: Kynosoft releases Magic Splitter
item.description: Magic Splitter is a quick and easy to use file splitting and checksum utility.

item.title: Zephyr Automated Test Runner 1.0.0 released
item.description: Zephyr is an automated functional and regression testing tool.

item.title: Thunderbird Software release WinCustomizer - Admin Edition for Windows XP
item.description: WinCustomizer - Admin Edition lets you set per-user settings for all the users on your system.
